scripts.db:generate-from-db: pnpm db:clean && pnpm db:pull && drizzle-kit generate:pg --schema ./postgres/schema.ts && cd ./drizzle && ls 0001*.sql | xargs cat
scripts.db:generate-from-meta: drizzle-kit generate:pg --schema ./postgres/schema.ts --out ./postgres/migrations && cd ./postgres/migrations && ls *.sql | xargs cat
